search.query:
| rest splunk_server=local /services/authentication/current-context | fields username
| lookup ssphp_user_service_defaults.csv ssphp.service.iso AS username OUTPUT ssphp.service.id AS svc
```| eval svc=mvappend('svc',"shaf") | eval svc=mvappend('svc',"ds") | eval svc=mvappend('svc',"fs")``` | eval link_target=case(isnull('svc'),"/en-GB/app/{{app}}{{environment}}/ssphp_dfe_service_portfolio_overview", like('svc',"%shaf%"),"/en-GB/app/{{app}}{{environment}}/ssphp_dfe_shaf_dash?form.tkn_rolls_up_to=*", like('svc',"%fs%"),"/en-GB/app/{{app}}{{environment}}/ssphp_foundational_systems_posture", like('svc',"%ds%"),"/en-GB/app/{{app}}{{environment}}/ssphp_dfe_service_portfolio_overview", mvcount('svc')>0,"/en-GB/app/{{app}}{{environment}}/ssphp_dfe_service_overview_iso", 1==1,"/en-GB/app/{{app}}{{environment}}/ssphp_dfe_service_portfolio_overview") | table link_target
